dict.acceptation: 阶段，阶级；等级，级别；标准；班级；

sent.orig: According to Hunt and Hess grading: One patient was grade, one grade and one grade.
sent.trans: Hunt和Hess分类：1例为级，1例为级，1例为级。

sent.orig: Reagent grade, pharmaceutical grade, grade, cosmetics, industrial, and so on.
sent.trans: 试剂级，医药级，食品级，化妆品级，工业级等。

sent.orig: Many model, for grade, for analysis grade and semiconductor grade.
sent.trans: 各种款式：工业级、分析及、以及半导体级，可满足不同客户需求。

sent.orig: Grade: Your grade on Paper 1 will contribute 20% of your final course grade.
sent.trans: 成绩：你所得的论文1的成绩占期末成绩20%。

sent.orig: Conventional radiogram: 45%images in grade A, 41.6%in grade B, 11.2%in grade C, and 2.2%images condemned.
sent.trans: 传统照片甲片率45%、乙级片率41.6%、丙级片率11.2%、废片率2.2%。
